entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries late this morning and this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Thursday 20 April 2023
